snippet: George Soros, 82, and his girlfriend, Tamiko Bolton, 40, announced their engagement on Saturday night at his summer home in Southampton, N.Y., before a small group of friends. It will be the third marriage for the billionaire hedge fund magnate.
abstract: George Soros, 82, and his girlfriend, Tamiko Bolton, 40, announced their engagement on Saturday night at his summer home in Southampton, N.Y., before a small group of friends. It will be the third marriage for the billionaire hedge fund magnate.

byline.original: By MICHAEL J. DE LA MERCED

headline.main: Soros Prepares to Walk Down the Aisle for the Third Time
